nawa wahana liyapadinchi kirimedi ingrisi akuru thunaka ankayak handunwa dimata motar ratha prawahana departhamenthuwa piyawara gani.hadisiyema narahenpita motar ratha prawahana komasaris departhamenthuwa wetha eeye (13) ude giya prawahana amathi kumara welgama mahatha mema nawa wadapiliwela pilibandawada soya baliya.kisidu akramikathawakin thorawa janathawa apahasuthawakata pathnowana ayurin widhimath kramawedayakata anuwa nawa wadapiliwela kriyathmaka karana lesa mehidi amathiwaraya adala niladharinta upades dunneya. 2000 wasaredi ji. ee. 0000 kandaye patan gath anka me wanawita awasan wemin pawathina athara ee anuwa mema wadapiliwela kriyathmaka kere. 2000 wasare sita 2009 wasara dakwa ingrisi akuru sahitha ankawalin liyapadinchi wahana sankhyawa 18,89,226 ki.pudgalika samagamak magin mema thahadu nishpadanaya karana athara ema thahaduwala pramithiyada amathiwarayage parikshawata lakwiya.dinakata anka thahadu 1600 k pamana nishpadanaya kere.
